name: Cave of Avaritia FULL ver.
description:
Welcome adventurners to cave full with treasure. Whoever can own it, you will not have to work anymore for entire life. Once you entered the dungeon, the entrance shut itself. You have no other choice. You have to go forward, fighting monsters, finding chest and avoiding traps. If you want to have a taste of it, we are inviting you to play this game.

- Have a feel of boadgame  style.

- Fighting face to face with monsters and using Skill cards.

- Exciting events that will keep thrilled!!!

I hope you will enjoy it :)
